name: Pokémon Super Mystery Dungeon
description: Pokémon Super Mystery Dungeon (Japanese: ポケモン超不思議のダンジョン Hepburn: Pokémon Chō Fushigi no Danjon) is a roguelike video game in the Pokémon Mystery Dungeon series developed by Spike Chunsoft, published by The Pokémon Company and distributed by Nintendo for the Nintendo 3DS handheld game console. Like its predecessors, players control a human who has awoken as a Pokémon in a world filled entirely by Pokémon, and must travel through dungeons completing missions and battling enemies. The game was released in Japan on September 17, 2015, in North America on November 20, 2015, in Europe on February 19, 2016, and in Australia on February 20, 2016.
